comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "THOUSAND IN CROWD AT TAFT'S RECEPTION; Thirty-eight Nations Represented at Brilliant New Year Gathering at White House. WASHINGTON, Jan. 1. -- Long before 11 o'clock this morning, which was the hour announced for the opening of the President's New Year reception, thousands of persons stood in line from the entrance gate of the White House to the west door of the State Department." --more New York Times
